snippet: The city, trying again to settle a long-running lawsuit about its intelligence-gathering practices of Muslims, has agreed to give more power to a civilian monitor....

headline.main: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption
headline.print_headline: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption

lead_paragraph: The city, trying again to settle a long-running lawsuit about its intelligence-gathering practices of Muslims, has agreed to give more power to a civilian monitor.
